name: get_free_games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool epic_games_store.
Tool description: Search games/bundles/editors in Epic Games store, get latest news from the platform and present free games.
API description: Fetches the current list of free games from the Epic Games Store based on the specified locale and country.

locale.description: The locale code for the desired language (e.g., 'en-US').

country.description: The country code to filter the games (e.g., 'US').
